

<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.core -->
<!-- @name    settings -->

# ```js settings ```


Store all the sugar settings grabed from your scss settings


### Example (js)

```js
import settings from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/core/settings';
console.log(settings.unit); // => 'rem'
```
